items.title: iTerm2
items.subtitle: A terminal emulator for macOS, licensed under GPL-2.0-or-later

items.title: Sourcetree
items.subtitle: A GUI that offers a visual representation of git repositories

items.title: GitHub
items.subtitle: Hosting for software development and version control using Git

items.title: Yarn
items.subtitle: A software packaging system developed in 2016 by Facebook for Node.js JavaScript runtime environment that provides speed, consistency, stability, and security as an alternative to npm (package manager)

items.title: ESlint
items.subtitle: Static code analysis tool for identifying problematic patterns found in JavaScript

items.title: Stylelint
items.subtitle: A mighty, modern linter for styles

items.title: CodeKit
items.subtitle: A modern web development tool for compiling, bundling, optimisation, etc.

items.title: Markdown
items.subtitle: A lightweight markup language for creating formatted text

items.title: MermaidJS
items.subtitle: A Javascript based diagramming and charting tool that renders Markdown-inspired text definitions to create and modify diagrams dynamically
